scripts.clean: find ./ -type d -name '.turbo' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'storybook-static' -o -name 'node_modules' | xargs rm -rf && find ./ -type f -name '*.tsbuildinfo' | xargs rm -f
scripts.hooks:pub: pnpm hooks:build && cd apps/hooks && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.ut:pub: pnpm ut:build && cd apps/utils && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.in:pub: pnpm in:build && cd apps/internal-ui && npm version patch && npm publish
